divs: Sighting Details1. During the sighting I was smoking a cigarette outside on a raised terrace in the Los Angeles neighborhood of silver lake facing E. 2. A large, silent flash of light high above me in the sky caught my attention,after receding it immediately reveled the craft. 3. I thought the object was an extraterrestrial vessel emerging from a visual field cloaking device and ascending out of Earth's atmosphere. 4. After the explosion-like flash of light receded, there was a dark craft with light edges, shaped with rectangular and cube-like protuberances. After hovering briefly, the object began a rapid ascent into the upper atmosphere which lasted very briefly, only 4-5 seconds. The object quickly became a faint point of light in the upper horizon, before disappearing entirely. 5. At the time of the sighting, I felt confused and impressed by how a craft could demonstrate a silent explosion (an impossibility?) as a mechanism for some sort of function, and by comparison, how backwards and simple our Earthly technology seemed. 6. After the craft's rapid ascent it disappeared out of Earth atmosphere.
Summary: UFO APPEARS AFTER SILENT FLASH OF LIGHT AND ASCENDS INTO UPPER ATMOSPHERE
